title: Lucid, Tesla, Nvidia, Cisco: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Lucid shares were extending their climb; Cisco and Nvidia are due to report after the close
body:
Futures are wavering ahead of another set of earnings reports from retailers and technology firms. Here’s what we’re watching on Wednesday:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
